title: My honor level is bugged
body:
Hey! In october my honor level dropped to level 0, after that I was friendly and got a lot of honors, but it's stuck at zero.
What bothers me is that when I get 2 honors it displays in the loading screen that I am level 5.
Is my honor level bugged on my profile?

replies.body: That does sound rather odd, have you been refreshing your client at all since your honor dropped? I did double check and you're still at honor rank 0 so it does sound like some visual bug. Try closing/repairing your client really quick and lemme know if it fixes it!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gK0JvIhT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-15T01:56:08.486+0000)
>
> That does sound rather odd, have you been refreshing your client at all since your honor dropped? I did double check and you're still at honor rank 0 so it does sound like some visual bug. Try closing/repairing your client really quick and lemme know if it fixes it!

Okay, thanks, I will let you know when I play and get an honor so I can see ^_^
